item.description:
We can go to Chinatown and celebrate for Asian New Year with lots of good food and company. Please come at 6:30 pm to mix and mingle before dinner. We have a lot of new members that have signed up for this event.

We will be having a set menu and price per person for this event. It is the only way the restaurant can handle such a large group. After dinner we plan to go to Golden Leaf (karoke club) nearby in Chinatown. There may be another group going clubbing as well. We will make these announcements during the evening as well.

Cost is $25/person (CASH ONLY) which includes tax & tip. We are having a 10 course meal. Payment will be made when you arrive. Please bring the exact amount. And please update your RSVP if yours plan change.

Parking - there is $6 validated parking special rate. You must go into the restaurant and pay for the $6 parking fee and they will then give you a parking coupon. Park your car next door to the restaurant and present your parking tix to the attendant. This rate of $6 is for the entire nite. If you go directly into the parking lot the cost is $12.

Menu - 10 course meal

Seafood soup

 

Salt/spicy shrimp

Seafood Nest

Twin lobsters

Fried chicken (full plate)

Flounder

Vegetable Dish

Sweet & Sour Pork chop

Yang Chow fried rice

Yee Mein

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Chinese New Year Dinner Celebration in Chinatown
